categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Jedi Knight served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic in the decade marked by the Separatist Crisis and the Clone Wars.

A Force-sensitive was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order and achieved the rank of Jedi Knight during the decade marked by the Separatist Crisis and the Clone Wars. During an encounter with the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar, the Knight was slain, one of three Jedi who met their end on Ezzar's blade.
